document.full_text: julia goerges continued her impressive run on clay when she brushed aside russia's anastasia pavlyuchenkova 6-4 6-2 on friday to set up a madrid open semi-final against fourth seed victoria azarenka.
document.title: goerges to meet azarenka in madrid open semis
lines_and_colors: julia goerges continued her impressive run on clay when she brushed aside russia's anastasia pavlyuchenkova 6-4 6-2 on friday to set up a madrid open semi-final against fourth seed victoria azarenka.
